name: Planet Escape (MhCanova)
description:
After completing GameDev.tv course "Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D" in Udemy, I decided to work and polish Project Boost, making it my first game ever developed. 

It consists of 5 levels, the goal being reaching the next pod without hitting any obstacles (bonus points for landing on your feet!).

Play on full screen for max resolution.
You can hit Esc to access the pause menu while in game.

Controls: 

A (left) & D (right) to rotate, Space bar to "boost".
